author: maria451
title: Excellent location for transport links
text: We picked this hotel because it is only a 10-15 minute walk from Beijing central railway station. We arrived late so took a taxi from the rail station 13 rmb, other times we walked. The airport shuttle bus stops adjacent to the rail station. We were very satisfied with all aspects of the hotel especially chambermaids who did an excellent job of keeping the rooms clean and were very courteous and helpful as were all the staff. Would definately recommend.
